00029 namespace amf {

00031 class RandomInitialization
00032 {
00033  public:
00034   // Empty constructor required for the InitializeRule template
00035   RandomInitialization() { }
00036 
00037   template<typename MatType>
00038   inline static void Initialize(const MatType& V,
00039                                 const size_t r,
00040                                 arma::mat& W,
00041                                 arma::mat& H)
00042   {
00043     // Simple implementation (left in the header file due to its simplicity).
00044     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00045     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00046 
00047     // Intialize to random values.
00048     W.randu(n, r);
00049     H.randu(r, m);
00050   }
00051 };
00052 
00053 }; // namespace amf
00054 }; // namespace mlpack

00056 #endif
